biotools.summary: A tool for annotating genomic variants that could influence post-transcriptional regulation. utR.annotation is an R package that can be used to annotate potential deleterious variants in the UTR regions for both human and mouse species.

bioschemas.name: utR.annotation
bioschemas.summary: A tool for annotating genomic variants that could influence post-transcriptional regulation. utR.annotation is an R package that can be used to annotate potential deleterious variants in the UTR regions for both human and mouse species.
